Name: Traveler of Artcaster
About the game: Traveler of Artcaster is an indie adventure Rpg taking place in the fanatsy world named 'Artcaster'. You start at the small island named Romo . After years of waiting you are finally old enough to search you father, who was fighting for the King of Artcaster many years ago. You journey begins at the Angora Forest which is located at the North of Romo. At jour Journey you will get many friends and maybe a companion who helps you at the fights. Traveler of Artcaster is an 2D Rpg game with a leveling and fighting system . It uses a multiple choice framework . That means that you decide your own fate and every player may have a different ending.
